Classes and Sublcasses

Barbarian

Path Of The Ancestral Guardian Path Of The Totem Warrior Path Of The Berserker Path Of The Zealot Path Of The Storm Herald Battlerager (Open To All Races)

Bard

College Of Glamour College Of Swords College Of Lore College Of Valor College Of Whispers

Cleric

All PHB And XgtE Order Domain (From GGtR)

Druid

All PHB And XgtE

Fighter

Champion Battlemaster Cavalier Eldritch Knight Honour Guard (Samurai Renamed)

Monk

Kensei Open Hand Sun Soul Drunken Master Shadow Monk Long Death

Paladin

All PHB And XgtE Oath Of The Crown

Ranger

All PHB And XgtE Revised Ranger is not allowed. *When choosing an animal companion for the Beastmaster, please verify in #charactercreation that the animal choice makes sense for the setting.*

Rogue

All PHB And XgtE

Sorcerer

All PHB And XgtE

Warlock

Archfey Fiend Hexblade Great Old One Celestial

Warlocks have been homebrewed in the Badlands to better fit the setting. Please ensure that you read the following article when making a warlock character: Warlocks in the Badlands

Wizard

All PHB, XgtE And Sword Coast The Bladesinger is known as The Order of the Stars and is not restricted to any given race. It was developed by the elves but is known by all.
